name: LaserZone
description:
LaserZone is a puzzle-game with a flavor of an action game.

+ Core Fun-Factor
- Solve puzzle-based levels by exploiting weapons and gimmicks
- Grow your character by acquiring weapons and armor
- Dramatic storytelling

+ Game Features
- Sci-Fi world and civilization, superior to that of a modern period
- Sophistically crafted levels with more than one answer
- Hidden levels, items and story
- High-quality graphics with rendered resources converted to sprites
